alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 10:42PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lincoln and west central Flathead Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1041 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles west of Whitefish, or 26 miles northwest of Kalispell, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Olney, Lupfer, Stryker and Radnor. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 138 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
